title: With non-deprecated constructors, IndexWriter's autoCommit is always true
description: With non-deprecated constructors, IndexWriter's autoCommit is always true.

comments.content: Or is the intention to make autoCommit always false after deprecated constructors are removed?
comments.author: Ning Li

comments.content:
Or is the intention to make autoCommit always false after deprecated constructors are removed? 

Right, that (autoCommit is always false) is the intention, in 3.0.
comments.author: Michael McCandless

comments.content: When deprecated constructors are removed in 3.0, autoCommit will always be false.
comments.author: Ning Li
